name: Silesia Simulator
description:
Have you ever wondered how it feels to live in the Silesia?

Now you don't have to wonder. You can experience everyday silesian life in this simple game!

As always I had great loss of motivation at the last day of game jam, but somehow I managed to finish it.

Theme of the game jam was Deeper and deeper. My idea was to make a game about a person who lost their memory (maybe even mind). While deeper exploring the city he would discover depths of his dark memories. Unfortunately I couldn't come up with a fine story, so I changed my conception of the game. That's why it became "collect diamonds, escape zombies" type of game.
